name: DIY Projects - Do it and relax
name_original: DIY Projects - Do it and relax
description:
Meet our hero!
Victór is a sculptor, graphic artist, potter and designer. One of the most famous representatives of the “Do It Yourself” artistic movement aka DIY. Born May 11, 1994 in the city of Florence, Italy, in the family of a wealthy lawyer.

As a child, Victór was a quick-witted, but uncontrollable child. Once in the marketplace he started a scandal so intence, that a huge crowd gathered around, and the police even had to ask the owner of the shop to open it during the siesta to give the boy a candy. Whims, persuasion — you name it, Victór always attracted attention and sought to achieve his goal.

Like many creative persons, he was a "strange" child, which prevented him from making friends. Classmates often bullied Victór and even slipped grasshoppers behind his collar, which he was terribly afraid of! But art was always a salvation, and Victór plunged headlong into it…

At the age of six already, the boy showed an interest in drawing, and the kindness of his parents played into his hands: he was even allocated a whole room for a workshop, clearing the laundry room in the attic from rubbish. Here he painted the surroundings all day long, and at the age of ten he created his first impressionist oil painting! Four years later, his work was already being shown to the public at the city exhibition in Florence, and three years later — in Rome!

In DIY Projects, you play as an eccentric design genius — Victór and help him bring all the most cherished desires and projects to life! Smash obstacles and use cool power-ups to complete exciting levels! With each breathtaking level, new creative stars, new rewards and new DIY activities await!

Start your journey to the heights of design glory right now!

DIY Projects features:
• Design and create your own unique paintings, sculptures, ceramics, bouquets and more. The only limit is your own imagination!
• Play numerous ASMR games.
• Enjoy a new unique match 3 experience with fun obstacles and exciting levels!
• Collect loads of coins in bonus levels!
• Get powerful boosters and open wonderful gifts with magical rewards!
• Explore and create new spaces: rooftop restaurants, romantic gazebos, luxury yachts, and more!
